Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Toledo in 1973...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Boston (FBA) on 6/28/1983, striking out 9...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1983, winning 2 games with a 0.60 ERA...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Wisconsin on 1/31/1984 (Going to WIS: P L. Marx, RF A. Sinclair. Going to PIT: LF A. Rahim, 1B K. Garrett, 3B J. Hollingsworth, CF B. Perales)...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
